languages.text: Лорд-капитану поступило прошение об оценке действий сенешаля Абеляра Версериана. Ситуация в одном из секторов нижних палуб, сложившаяся в результате его решений, грозит стать проблемой для всего корабля.

The Lord Captain has received a plea to assess the actions of Seneschal Werserian. As a result of Werserian's decisions regarding a situation in one of the sectors on the lower decks, the problem now threatens to engulf the whole ship.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану поступило прошение об оценке действий сенешаля Абеляра Версериана. Ситуация в одном из секторов нижних палуб, сложившаяся в результате его решений, грозит стать проблемой для всего корабля.

The Lord Captain has received a plea to assess the actions of Seneschal Werserian. As a result of Werserian's decisions regarding a situation in one of the sectors on the lower decks, the problem now threatens to engulf the whole ship.

languages.text: 领主舰长收到了请求，希望能评估韦尔森总领的行为。韦尔森总领对下层甲板下达了某个命令，而这个命令引发了问题，可能会影响到整艘船。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has received a plea to assess the actions of Seneschal Werserian. As a result of Werserian's decisions regarding a situation in one of the sectors on the lower decks, the problem now threatens to engulf the whole ship.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长收到了请求，希望能评估韦尔森总领的行为。韦尔森总领对下层甲板下达了某个命令，而这个命令引发了问题，可能会影响到整艘船。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、家令長ウェルザリアンの行動を評価するよう嘆願された。下層デッキの1つのセクターの状況に関するウェルザリアンの判断の結果、今ではその問題が船全体を飲み込む恐れがある。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has received a plea to assess the actions of Seneschal Werserian. As a result of Werserian's decisions regarding a situation in one of the sectors on the lower decks, the problem now threatens to engulf the whole ship.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、家令長ウェルザリアンの行動を評価するよう嘆願された。下層デッキの1つのセクターの状況に関するウェルザリアンの判断の結果、今ではその問題が船全体を飲み込む恐れがある。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha recibido una petición de evaluar las acciones del Senescal Werserian. Como consecuencia de las decisiones de Werserian a la hora de solucionar un problema en las cubiertas inferiores, la situación amenaza con afectar a la nave entera.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has received a plea to assess the actions of Seneschal Werserian. As a result of Werserian's decisions regarding a situation in one of the sectors on the lower decks, the problem now threatens to engulf the whole ship.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha recibido una petición de evaluar las acciones del Senescal Werserian. Como consecuencia de las decisiones de Werserian a la hora de solucionar un problema en las cubiertas inferiores, la situación amenaza con afectar a la nave entera.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain wurde gebeten, das Vorgehen von Truchsess Werserian zu prüfen. Aufgrund von Werserians Entscheidungen bezüglich eines Vorfalls in einem der Sektoren auf den unteren Decks droht das Problem nun das gesamte Schiff zu erfassen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has received a plea to assess the actions of Seneschal Werserian. As a result of Werserian's decisions regarding a situation in one of the sectors on the lower decks, the problem now threatens to engulf the whole ship.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain wurde gebeten, das Vorgehen von Truchsess Werserian zu prüfen. Aufgrund von Weresians Entscheidungen bezüglich eines Vorfalls in einem der Sektoren auf den unteren Decks droht das Problem nun das gesamte Schiff zu erfassen.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine est prié|La seigneure-capitaine est priée} d'évaluer les décisions prises par le sénéchal Werserian. Les conséquences des décisions de Werserian suite à un problème dans une partie des ponts inférieurs menacent l'ensemble du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has received a plea to assess the actions of Seneschal Werserian. As a result of Werserian's decisions regarding a situation in one of the sectors on the lower decks, the problem now threatens to engulf the whole ship.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine est prié|La seigneure-capitaine est priée} d'évaluer les décisions prises par le sénéchal Werserian. Les conséquences des décisions de Werserian suite à un problème dans une partie des ponts inférieurs menacent l'ensemble du vaisseau.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, Seneşal Werserian'ın davranışlarını incelemesi için bir talep aldı. Werserian'ın alt güverte sektörlerinden birindeki duruma dair kararları, tüm gemiyi etkileyen bir tehlikeye dönüştü.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has received a plea to assess the actions of Seneschal Werserian. As a result of Werserian's decisions regarding a situation in one of the sectors on the lower decks, the problem now threatens to engulf the whole ship.
